THIS FUNCTION IS DEPRECATED SINCE 3.0

== Description ==
Fixes javascript bugs in browsers. 

Converts unicode characters to [[wikipedia:HTML|HTML]] numbered entities.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php funky_javascript_fix( $text ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$text|string|Text to be made safe.}}

== Return Values ==
; (string) : Fixed text.
